title: VLS Environmental Solutions opens waste-to-energy facility in Quartzsite - Arizona Big Media
summary: VLS Environmental Solutions has opened a new waste-to-energy processing facility in Quartzsite, AZ. The facility is designed to handle industrial, non-hazardous waste from various industries and transform it into sustainable energy solutions, replacing coal and natural gas. This facility signifies VLS's commitment to providing innovative and sustainable waste management solutions for clients.
